original_text: So someone may ask, ‘Does it help a person if they are a Jew, rather than a Gentile? Does it help a person if someone has circumcised them?’
korean_text: 그런즉 유대인의 나음이 무엇이며 할례의 유익이 무엇이냐

sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 어떤 사람이 물을 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: Does it help a person if they are a Jew
Does it help a person if someone has circumcised them?
